doc:
Bruce Weitz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Weitz 0 Bruce Peter Weitz (born May 27, 1943) is an American actor who is perhaps best known for his role as Sgt. Michael "Mick" Belker in the NBC police drama Hill Street Blues, which ran from 1981 until 1987. Weitz won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series in 1984 for his role in the series. Bruce_Peter_Weitz ( born May_27_,_1943 ) is an_American_actor who is_perhaps_best_known for his_role as Sgt._Michael_"_Mick_"_Belker in the_NBC_police_drama_Hill_Street_Blues , which ran from 1981 until 1987 . Weitz won an_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Drama_Series in 1984 for his_role in the_series .
